channel.title: Women on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Women on A Hugo website

item.title: Happy Ada Lovelace Day!
item.description: Today (March 24th) is Ada Lovelace day. It’s a day to remember that chicks dig technology and you don’t have to have a penis to be a geek. Mom, I know you find that hard to believe but it’s true. So part of Ada Lovelace day is to blog about women in technology. I love technology. I love women. I have a daughter named Ada whom I love. So it seems like I am more qualified than most to blog about women in tech.
